about_the_game:
Kincaid is a lewd platforming adventure with a sci-fi theme. Our protagonist is an archeologist, exploring uncharted planets and their wild life!

Join our playful and naughty wolf girl Kincaid, as she sexplores flora & fauna and meets new friends (with benefits~) and adversaries!

Kincaid is not alone: She is joined by her sidekick Ai, an artificial intelligence that lives inside her ship's computer and provides support from the orbit.

An exciting adventure full of hot action, burning lust and erotic surprises unfolds!

Meet Kincaid


Kincaid is a naughty wolf girl and quickly succumbs to sexy distractions. Give her a nudge to remind her of her quest - or do nothing and watch her satisfy her curiosity and lust!

She writes down all her "research findings" (unlocked scenes) in her journal for you to enjoy again at a later time.

The action focuses on a female protagonist facing male and female opponents, as well as some more exotic encounters.

Planned Features


  • Beautifully animated graphics and heart-throbbing high-res CGs!
  • Challenging boss battles.
  • Plan your next adventure from the safety of Kincaid's own space ship.
  • Fast-paced melee-oriented combat!
  • A breadth of abilities and items that can be combined to facilitate new strategies
  • Meet a colorful cast of NPC characters, each with their own unique and hand-crafted sex animations!
  • Explore lush and vibrant worlds, filled with secrets, hidden treasures and optional bosses.
  • Mysterious lore and rich backstory woven into events, dialogue, and item descriptions.
  • A gallery where you can relive the fun you had!

content_descriptors.notes:
This adult game contains scenes with sexual interaction between two or more characters.

The game does not contain non-consensual or violent sexual content.

The game contains depictions of sex in pixel graphics and high-resolution illustrated graphics.

name: The Adventures of Kincaid

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.2 Ghz or superior
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB (with shader support)
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
